title: How to put my phone in manual camera mode - Quora

response.answer_text: As noted by other replies … This is YAQWTOVAIID … Y)et A)nother Q)uestion W)hen T)he O)nly V)alid A)nswer I)s I)t D)epends What model? O/S? The owner’s manual for most smart-phones are on-line. Google is your friend.

upvoters.user_id: Rt Rev Pagan Archbishop John Seeley

response.answer_text: Which phone; which make, which model?! Not every phone has a “Manual” mode; update your question and I’m sure someone will be able to give you a detailed answer.
